channel.title: Sleep With Me | A Sleep Inducing Podcast | Helps You Fall Asleep Fast and Beat Insomnia like ASMR, Guided Meditation
channel.itunes:summary:
Are you up all night tossing and turning? Welcome to "Sleep With Me" The Podcast that Puts You to Sleep.
We do it with a bedtime story. All you need to do is get in bed, turn out the lights and press play.
Can't fall asleep? Mind racing at night? Worries keeping you awake? We are here to help!
"Sleep With Me" is a groundbreaking podcast, that uses boredom superpowers to help you fall asleep. Kind of like a bedtime story for grownups, just interesting enough for you to forget your problems but boring enough to put you to sleep. So get in bed, press play and drift off into dreamland.

image.title: Sleep With Me | A Sleep Inducing Podcast | Helps You Fall Asleep Fast and Beat Insomnia like ASMR, Guided Meditation

channel.itunes:author: Sleep Helper Bedtime Storyteller- Dearest Scooter Helps You Relax and Fall Asleep
channel.description:
Insomnia? Can't fall asleep? Mind racing at night? Worries keeping you awake? This is the podcast designed to help you fall asleep.
If you've tried pills, hypnosis, guided meditation and ASMR to no avail it is time to try "Sleep With Me".
Sleep With Me is a bedtime story that lets you forget your problems but progressively gets more boring until you fall to sleep.
So get in bed, press play and drift off into dreamland. This will be like one of those guided meditations to carry you off to slumber.
"Sleep With Me" is a groundbreaking podcast that uses boredom superpowers to help you fall asleep. So get in bed, press play and drift off into dreamland. If you have trouble falling asleep or insomnia you are in the right place!
The prefect blend of boredom and engagement so you can peacefully drift off.
This podcast is a bit silly and odd like a funny dream you can't remember.
Set your phone aside, press play, close your eyes, snuggle in and fall asleep with me.
-Dearest Scooter dearestscooter@sleepwithmepodcast.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Helps You Relax Fall Asleep Fast and Beat Insomnia | ASMR, Relaxing Guided Meditation rolled in one Bedtime Story | A Sleep Inducing Podcast

item.title: Season 2 Finale
item.description:
Our story comes to a gentle lulling close. Like a strange history lesson told by a teacher who has an imaginary male companion who talks nonsense.

8:50 Thanks

14:56 Agatha takes the mic

Sleep With Me is a bedtime story designed to take your mind off of the racing thoughts that keep you awake at night.

As you listen you will find yourself distracted from your worries and drifting off into dreamland..due to the fact the story gets a little bit more boring with each passing minute

This podcast is a little weird, a bit silly and a tad offensive so beware. It is very similar to ASMR or guided meditation bedtime story that slowly carries you off to slumber.

"Sleep With Me" is a groundbreaking podcast created to help you fall asleep. So get in bed, press play and drift off into dreamland.

If you struggle with insomnia or just getting a good night's rest, you've found the podcast for you.

Music by Christopher Postill @ Sounds Like An Earful Podcast "A Podcast about collecting stories, tinkering with noises and fumbling with really big questions"

Sleep With Me podcast art created by Always Trending Up Scott & Jennifer

Sleep With Me is written by Drew Ackerman and Performed by Dearest Scooter
item.itunes:subtitle: Our story comes to a gentle lulling close. (at 14:56) Like a strange history lesson told by a teacher who has an imaginary male companion who talks nonsense.

item.title: That Feeling in the Pit of your Lentils
item.description:
Can a mass of lentils cry? (story at about 19:50) Can a stepmother have feelings? Can you fall asleep? Yes, if you listen tonight you'll hear lots of talk that is distracting to both you and Agatha. So head off to dreamland and say hi the Miss Buttermaker Butterworth for me.

item.title: Cool, Cruel, Countenance
item.description:
A pit of lentils is the type of thing you don't come across every day (Agatha intro at 15:42Story at 19:10). It does raise the question, can lentils be poached? While I'm not clear on what poaching is, I can tell you that this story is like a warm bath that will make you nightime worries tender and edible. By the time you hear words like prince and pumpernickel or buttermaker and butterworth you won't need to worry if they ever went together because you will be floating on the surface of a dream...or your bed....not in the bath...don't listen to sleep podcasts in the bath.

Subscribe: iTunesRSSMore Subscribe Options

Support the podcast by shopping on Amazon

8:09 Thank yous

15:42 Agatha takes mic

19:10 or so story starts

item.title: Cinderella and the Queen of Lentils
item.description:
Fancy a watching a game of mancala? (Story at 7:42) What could soothe and numb your mind more. How about some ogers using a block and tackle or children dessing up like the kids from "Beyond Thunderdome"? We don't need to know the way home, just the way to the pit of lentils. You way will be down a fresh dirt road across thought and into deep sleep. Mostly, mostly so.

Support the podcast by shopping on Amazon

7:42 Agatha on the Mic

item.title: Stepmother in Need of a Crisis or Impossible Goal
item.description:
Like a bendy straw this intro is long and uh bendy. (Agatha intro at 20:19 story at 23:29) After we catch up and I apologize for the website and feed crash, the story will start.

Agatha will talk about immoveable beliefs and then be immersed in the magic of the theater with some real magic and some super dullness. If you somehow stay awake then you might hear tears, not from a radish or a male milk maiden but from adult fairy children. Is that French being sung or some other sound. Who know and who cares, you should be asleep by then.

"Lady Chatterly's Lover" by DH LawrenceMovie

Older After the Glass Slipper Episodes

The Amazing History of the Bendy Straw @theatlantic

How Are Bendy Straws Made @howstuffworks

World Famous Straw Method of Storytelling by Edgar Straw

Nuture and Nestle

Scriptnotes Podcast with podcast heroes John August and Craig Mazin - Note my use of rigor might have been incorrect but Craig was correctly referring to a discussion by Chris Miller and Philip Lord

Goodreads like "Lord of the Flies"
item.itunes:subtitle: Like a bendy straw this intro is long and uh bendy. (Agatha intro at 20:19 story at 23:29) After we catch up and I apologize for the website and feed crash, the story will start.

item.title: Fountainheads and Feelings
item.description: Compound words should confound the restless part of you mind. (6:49 Agatha takes the mic) While the music of the night is in the background, Agatha will take her first steps to insure they are all rescued by Cinderella. Sleep easy knowing not much will happen, there will be walking and talking and some of the backstory or exposition will be so boring even Agatha skips over it.
item.itunes:subtitle: Compound words should confound the restless part of you mind. (6:49 Agatha takes the mic) While the music of the night is in the background, Agatha will take her first steps to insure they are all rescued by Cinderella. Sleep easy knowing not much...

item.title: Lentils on the Lintel
item.description: One day you'll be a Nana, or just a man who says ok Nana I'll portray a grandmotherly figure. (6:40 Agatha's Intro) Or maybe you will just listen to that man...pretending to be a woman, trying to be a leader of Fairy Adults who may be children, all in a way that is so strange and soothing that concentration is improbable, understanding impossible but distraction is irresistible.

item.title: Butter Churning Lessons for Ogers
item.description:
Aqueducts and Udders (story at 12:25) will be the words that tingle the tips of your ears as you sleep to this part of the story. Agatha and the people need water to stay safe within the castle. Fastidiously clean creatures stand in their way.

11:03 Thanks
12:45 Agatha

item.title: Aggressive Contract Negotiations
item.description:
More chatting with letters and listening to bullfrogs for comfort (starts at 9:57). Clifford tries at acquire another pin, but at what cost? Like someone talking about pin trading I won't need to be listened too. But traps will be sprung, negotiations broken and emergency protocols activated all while you float on a bed of dreams. Or humming frogs.

3:01 Thanks

9:57 Agatha in the house

Hey You

9 to 5

Roifield Brown

http://www.10usp.com/

http://dumteedum.com/

http://howjamaica.podomatic.com/

http://midatlanticshow.com/

item.title: Scones, Butter and Guttural Communications
item.description:
After a certified maniac talks the brain version of dust devils, I give you my elevator pitch, spoiler alert, your uber is not coming right for another 30 minutes. Then I turn it over to Agatha. More talking letters, itching and snoring ogers and the chattering of a step-mother will be what carry you off the land of nod. Oh and some oger talking that sounds like a didgeridoo.

item.title: Talking Letters and Backpatting
item.description:
Agatha has to deal with sadness, subcontractors, contracts and ogres. Luckily she has Gonzalo to hum and a helpful NPC to answer a question. And her wits, always her wits. Worry not what waits at the city gates for a clouded pillow worlds of dreams is what awaits you where a shepherd boy gently rubs your back and a envelope distracts you from the truth with its banter.

5:19 Thanks

12:49 Another episode of After The Glass Slipper Begins

photo credit: smiling sockpuppet via photopin (license)

item.title: What Does It Take To Build a Pyramid?
item.description:
Fall asleep while a satchel of letters arrives from Cinderella. (starts at 8:17) How could you? Lots of talking , along with examinations of personal type stuff. There's a story in there so it should distract you, but don't worry about missing those letters as two of them have inspirational words of wisdom from Cinder and the other ends up as a cliffhanger, well more of a dreamhanger.

6:05 thanks

08:17 Story Starts

item.title: Redoubling Leadership Thru Envy
item.description:
How do you recover from the loss of a Fairy Godparent? (Starts at 7:57) By redoubling your efforts to lead as a leader. Create your own words and empower them with meaning. Or just listen to the expository dialogue and fall asleep. Settle in to a warm bowl of bone broth and imagine you are under the care of a wealthy bone baron. Or dream of one day marketing your own soup of jumbled words and becoming a baron of broth.

4:47 Thanks

7:57 Story Start

item.title: A Lesson in Opportunity
item.description:
A cauldron of bone broth gently stirred along with a long lesson on something about empowering empowerment. No need to learn, just listen and drift off as another episode of "After The Glass Slipper" slowly unfolds.

4:08 Thanks

8:21 Story
item.itunes:subtitle: A cauldron of bone broth gently stirred along with a long lesson on something about empowering empowerment. No need to learn, just listen and drift off as another episode of "After The Glass Slipper" slowly...

item.title: A Crisis of Leader-Should
item.description:
Does a wolf ever dream of being a sheep dog or a shepherd boy? Who would be dumb enough to let him answer that question in reality? Not me. Tonight questions like that will be asked as part of lots of talking and very little doing. We will learn the name of the shepherd boy and hear Agatha have some feelings, but most of it will only be noise your ears hear but your mind does not.

3:29 Thank Yous

9:11 Story Starts

item.title: Part 3 - "After The Glass Slipper" Season 1 Supercut
item.description: The final part of Season One of "After The Glass Slipper". Season Two "The Last Royal" should launch on Thursday and then we will return to our normal schedule.
item.itunes:subtitle: The final part of Season One of "After The Glass Slipper". Season Two "The Last Royal" should launch on Thursday and then we will return to our normal schedule.

item.title: Tell Me More Temporary Queen
item.description: A hypnotic globe lulls you to sleep. Is a orb of seeing or a fishbowl? What if active listening was so exhausting you just fell into a deep slumber? There you could dream of smiling fairy godmothers and not worry about shepherd boys or running a kingdom. Save your questions and answers for a sensible podcast. This one drops words like Ambien as the syrup on your emotional stir-up.

item.title: After the Glass Slipper Part One
item.description:
Happy New Year! My new years gift from fate was a total meltdown of my audio recorder. Luckily I have this three part collection of every After the Glass Slipper mashed together. I already ordered a replacement so new episodes will be on the way by the end of next week!

A supercut of the entire season of "After The Glass Slipper" in three parts.

item.data-extra-description: SEASON FINALE of After The Glass Slipper
item.title: Poop Jewels
item.description:
Be bored to sleep tonight by one final climax! YES! A final showdown with water, monsters, seasandhorse men, rebels, fairies, humans, sponges, and Cinderella, Agatha, Roland and the Fairy Godmother.

"After The Glass Slipper", the story of Cinderella, her Fairy Godmother and her Stepmother after she became a princess continues,

Links

Jewelry made of poop

Daylight Savings Time

How do I deal with Daylight Savings Time and sleep?

Show bloopers on facebook

"I've Been Wormin' Around" (in bloopers) is based on this song

Sleep With Me is a bedtime story designed to take your mind off of the racing thoughts that keep you awake at night. As you listen you will find yourself distracted from your worries and drifting off into dreamland..due to the fact the story gets a little bit more boring with each passing minute.

"Sleep With Me" is a groundbreaking podcast created to help you fall asleep. So get in bed, press play and drift off into dreamland. If you struggle with insomnia or just getting a good night's rest, you've found the podcast for you.

item.title: Giant Kickass Worm
item.description:
The Stepmother is a worm searching the earth's mantle and talking to mole-men. While Cinderella and crew fight Laplanders, and other creatures from various monster manuals and childhood nightmares.

"After The Glass Slipper", the story of Cinderella, her Fairy Godmother and her Stepmother after she became a princess continues,

My sincere apology to both Michael Eric Dyson and Neil deGrasse Tyson for mixing you up and associating you with this podcast, Fred Ward for forgetting your last name and the layers of the Earth for making up words related to you. I'm an ignorant asshole.

item.title: The Wand
item.description:
Tonight be bored to sleep as we continue to follow Cinderella's stepmother and fairy godmother. When we last left off the Stepmother was crafting a plan to deal with the "evil witch" godmother.

What will happen?

Put your phone aside get under the covers and fall asleep with me.

item.title: The Patient Stepmother
item.description:
Tonight we look at what happened after Cinderella tried on the glass slipper and was swept away to her new life. What really happened to her Stepmother and her stepsisters?

This will be an ongoing series until we answer this question and more.
